items.title: With Hamas regaining strength, countries are reconsidering sending their forces to Gaza

items.title: Photos of the week by Haaretz photographers
Why this Israeli ethics professor differentiates between living and dead hostages

items.title: Israeli settlers torch vehicles in West Bank Palestinian villages, reports say

items.title: Satellite images show extent of demolition at the White House
